QuestData.Title: A Few Good Gnomes
QuestData.Description: Our engineers have been working on getting our battle machines ready for our assault on Gnomeregan, but we're out of pilots!$B$BWe've developed a device called the Motivate-a-Tron, which prevents distraction from other sources and gives the gnome the courage to enlist.$B$BAfter motivating a few Gnome Citizens, lead them out to Captain Tread Sparknozzle out at Steelgrill's Depot, just south of Ironforge.$B$BOh, and be careful. The device is still a little experimental.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recruit Gnome Citizens from Tinker Town using the Motivate-a-Tron and lead them to Captain Tread Sparknozzle at Steelgrill's Depot.

Objectives.Objective: Motivated Gnomes Brought to Captain Sparknozzle
